books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by CJ Lyons
books.description: A woman finds no closure after a man is executed for the murder of her husband and son.
books.name: BLIND FAITH

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is stationed with his family on a military base in Okinawa in the mid-1970s.
books.name: SECOND SON

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: A turbocharged case unfolds for the forensic anthropologist Temperance Brennan in the series behind the TV show “Bones.”
books.name: FLASH AND BONES

books.author: by David Nicholls
books.description: Checking in year by year on the confused, halting romance of two children of the ’80s.
books.name: ONE DAY

books.author: by Chris Culver
books.description: Against orders, a former homicide detective begins an investigation into his niece’s murder.
books.name: THE ABBEY

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow’s secret, which revealed will change many lives in her Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by Tatiana de Rosnay
books.description: A contemporary American journalist investigates what happened to a little girl during the roundup of Jews in Paris in 1942.
books.name: SARAH’S KEY

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Nina Bloom, who years ago changed her identity to save her life, is forced to confront the past and the killer she thought she had escaped.
books.name: NOW YOU SEE HER

books.author: by J. A. Jance
books.description: A Seattle homicide detective’s search for the killer of a little girl leads him into a murky world of religious fanaticism.
books.name: UNTIL PROVEN GUILTY

books.author: by George R. R. Martin
books.description: After a colossal battle, the Seven Kingdoms face new threats; Book 5 of “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
books.name: A DANCE WITH DRAGONS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A criminal wants to save an innocent man on death row, but to do so, he must convince the authorities he’s telling the truth.
books.name: THE CONFESSION

books.author: by Johanna Lindsey
books.description: A beautiful captive becomes the captor of a handsome thane in the age of the Vikings.
books.name: HEARTS AFLAME
